passage_text: average hedge fund trader salaries for job postings in manhattan ny are 36 % higher than average hedge fund trader salaries for job postings nationwide

Hedge fund professionals have seen higher compensation for the third consecutive year, with the average salary for an entry-level analyst at a mid-performing hedge fund totaling $335,000 in 2013, an industry report has found.

Average Hedge Fund Trader Salaries. The average salary for hedge fund trader jobs is $81,000. Average hedge fund trader salaries can vary greatly due to company, location, industry, experience and benefits. This salary was calculated using the average salary for all jobs with the term hedge fund trader anywhere in the job listing.
